title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practice Competencies: Manifold Learning-Based Simulation for Curved Surface Data Interpolation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of manifold learning algorithms (LLE, HLLE, LTSA) for transforming 3D surfaces into 2D planes.
Learners can perform surface data interpolation simulations using smartphone-based VR tools in limited technological environments.
Learners can assess the impact of manifold learning-based interpolation accuracy on fluid-structure interaction analysis through case studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
